events.title: Maria Violaris Talk
events.content: Ms. Maria Violaris is a PhD student at Oxford and one of the rising starts of the field! She founded Oxford Quantum Information society, did 2 internships at Riverlane and IBM. She is a contributor for the Physics World magazine, and a researcher in the foundations of quantum mechanics and applications of quantum technology.

events.title: IBM - QNLP
events.content: IBM will come to give a talk on quantum natural language processing (QNLP). A field that was invented by Prof. Bob Coecke from Oxford university, and now begins to have some practical use cases as well. Following the talk, an hands-on workshop on QNLP will be held.

events.title: QURECA
events.content: Dr. Araceli Venegas-Gomez, the founder and CEO of QURECA - quantum resources and careers will give a talk regarding the quantum industry, and where we can fit into it following our bachelor/master/PhD. If you wish start working in the quantum industry next year, this talk is definitely for you!

events.title: NQCC Hackathon
events.content:
UK's National Quantum Computing Center first Hackathon!
More details soon...
